newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK 182-day bills average accepted yield 5.39 pct.
newsitem.headline: HK 182-day bills average accepted yield 5.39 pct.

text.p: The average accepted yield of 182-day Exchange Fund bills at Tuesday's tender was 5.39 percent, the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) said.

This compares with six-month HIBOR of 5.97596 percent at 0300 GMT and the average accepted yield of 5.30 percent at the pervious tender on August 27. Bids for the HK$800 million issue rose to HK$5.12 billion from HK$3.64 billion.

The average accepted yield of 91-day bills was 5.22 percent, compared with three-month HIBOR of 5.71635 percent at 0300 GMT and the average accepted yield of 5.20 percent at the pervious tender last week.
Bids for the HK$1.50 billion issue were HK$5.93 billion vs HK$4.87 billion.
